about_the_game:
After finally finishing the project and planning to treat myself to a good meal, just as I was about to dig into the lavish dishes I splurged on, I unexpectedly got transported to another world—and turned into a "Slime"!

Fortunately, I gained the ability to "Devour All Things." By defeating minor monsters, I can absorb their attributes and even their skills.

Pet synthesis allows identical pets to develop different skill combinations. Skills aren't just about stacking stats—strategic pairings can create synergies greater than the sum of their parts. For example, combining "Combo" with "Counterattack" lets you trigger consecutive strikes during counterattacks.

The early stages might feel overwhelming, but once you collect enough pets and master their skills, you'll discover the joy of building teams and crafting skill combos.

Welcome to experience this magical world! If you're a content creator, streamer, or simply eager to recommend this game to friends, feel free to contact me for redemption codes. Suggestions, collaborations, and feedback are also welcome!

※Note: The game is still in development and receiving regular updates. Features like the Third Demon King, Final Demon Lord, and reincarnation mechanics are pending. If you'd like to play the complete version, consider wishlisting it and staying tuned for updates!
